game.title: The Lost Temple
game.objective: Retrieve the ancient artifact from the lost temple
game.description: The village elder has asked for your help in retrieving a powerful artifact that was lost during a previous expedition to the ancient temple. The temple is said to be filled with traps and puzzles, but the reward will be worth it.

task.objective: Locate the hidden entrance to the temple
task.description: The village elder has given you a map that leads to the hidden entrance of the temple. However, you will need to use your wits to find it.

task.objective: Solve the pressure plate puzzle in the temple's entrance chamber
task.description: In the entrance chamber, you will find a series of pressure plates that must be stepped on in a specific order to unlock the door. You will need to observe and record the symbols etched into the walls to figure out the correct sequence.

task.objective: Defeat the temple's guardian in combat
task.description: The temple is guarded by a powerful entity that will not let you pass without a fight. You will need to use your combat skills and strategies to defeat it.
